text: So a finance purchase occurs when you purchase of a new life insurance policy involves the use of funds obtained by the withdrawal or surrender of, or by borrowing some or all the other policy values, including accumulated dividends of an existing policy, to pay all or part of any premium or payment due on the new policy.

speaker: agent
text: A finance purchase is a replacement, so you should carefully consider whether a replacement is in your best interest.
